cadmax-valley.title: Cadmax Valley
cadmax-valley.description: Cadmax Valley, an exclusive new venture by Cadmax & Mahakaal Builders LLP, redefines highend living in Govindpura, Jaipur. Launched in February 2025 and slated for handover by December 2025, this thoughtfully crafted enclave spans 0.87 acres and offers 18 premium plots ranging from 936 to 1,553 sq ft.
cadmax-valley.name: Mr. Dilip Rathore
cadmax-valley.content: With the great designing services of Cadmax we have constructed one of the best residential scheme of jagatpura

topographical-survey.title: Topographical Survey, Kumbhalgarh
topographical-survey.description: We performed a topographical land survey at Kumbhalgarh for Kedia Builders comprising of different topographical levels , the area comprised approximately 10 hactares of land , surveying such a large area in typical slopes of Kumbhalgarh with full accuracy made it a remarkable task for Cadmax Projects Pvt. Ltd.
topographical-survey.content: At first I was  doubtful that can Cadmax perfectly survey the mountain land with too many slopes, but they made me confindent with the result, surveyed it with full accuracy.
topographical-survey.name: Mr. Gaurav Kedia

cadmax-group-headoffice.title: Cadmax Group Headoffice
cadmax-group-headoffice.content: Europian theme interiors are one of the interiors that are difficult to design, but team  Cadmax has desgined it to the perfection, Fully satisfied with their work.
cadmax-group-headoffice.description: The Cadmax Group Head Office stands as a remarkable architectural statement, meticulously designed in the European Neoclassical style. Drawing inspiration from the grandeur and symmetry of classical European architecture, the building reflects a timeless aesthetic that blends elegance with corporate sophistication.

ravi-kiran-vihar.title: Ravi Kiran Vihar
ravi-kiran-vihar.description: Ravi Kiran Vihar is a posh and well-developed residential colony, known for its serene environment and upscale living. Comprising over 30 lavish villas, the colony offers a perfect blend of modern architecture and peaceful surroundings. Each villa is thoughtfully designed, featuring spacious layouts, premium amenities, and elegant finishes, catering to the tastes of discerning homeowners. With well-maintained roads, lush greenery, and a strong sense of community, Ravi Kiran Vihar stands as a symbol of luxury and refined living.
ravi-kiran-vihar.content: Spacious villas with spectacular designing having top amanities  ,you really won my heart Cadmax

shivam-majestic.title: Shivam Majestic
shivam-majestic.description: Shivam Majestic, located in the rapidly developing area of Jagatpura, is a modern residential project that offers a perfect balance of comfort, convenience, and style. Designed with contemporary architecture and quality construction, Shivam Majestic caters to families looking for a peaceful yet well-connected lifestyle. The project features thoughtfully planned apartments with ample natural light, ventilation, and essential amenities to support urban living.
shivam-majestic.content: As the name of the apartment, Cadmax has done a majestic work in designing it, Planning, interiors, architechture all are at its best.
shivam-majestic.name: Mr. Dilip Rathore

sukoon-farms.title: Sukoon Farms
sukoon-farms.description: Sukoon Farms, nestled in the tranquil surroundings of Jamaramgarh, Ajmer, is a serene getaway that lives up to its name—Sukoon, meaning peace. Surrounded by nature, this beautifully developed farm property offers a perfect escape from the noise and chaos of city life. Whether you're looking for a weekend retreat, a second home, or a peaceful space to reconnect with nature, Sukoon Farms provides the ideal setting.
sukoon-farms.content: Cadmax has designed this farmhouse township in the lap of nature with proper parks , roads , electricity etc., the maingate design provides the best entrance possible to the farmhouses.

dravyawati-river.title: Dravyawati River
dravyawati-river.content: Surveyed the 47.5 km long Dravyawati river perfectlty, We chose the best for this work.
dravyawati-river.description: The Dravyawati River, historically known as the Amanishah Nallah, is an ancient river flowing through the city of Jaipur, Rajasthan. Originating from the western slopes of the Amber hills, the river stretches over a length of approximately 47.5 kilometers before merging with the Dhund River. Its land survey was conducted by Cadmax pvt.ltd. in 2016 under Tata Projects Ltd.

mangalam-vishwakarma-industrial-park.title: Mangalam Vishwakarma Industrial Park
mangalam-vishwakarma-industrial-park.description: Manglam Vishwakarma Industrial Park is an emerging industrial node in Jaipur tailored for modern infrastructure needs. With varied plot sizes, future-ready amenities, sustainable systems, and clear project timelines, it's structured for businesses seeking organized, eco-conscious industrial space—especially where long-term planning aligns with future industrial operations.
mangalam-vishwakarma-industrial-park.content: Planned a 15 hactare land to a majestic industrial hub with full amenities and maximum sellable area, amazing work.

govind-bagh.title: Govind Bagh
govind-bagh.description: Govind Bagh is a residential enclave comprising multiple plotted development phases by Govind Kripa Infra Projects LLP, situated in and around the rapidly developing localities of Jagatpura and Sitapura, Jaipur. These projects focus on offering modern lifestyle amenities combined with strategic connectivity and planned infrastructure, all within serene, gated-community settings
govind-bagh.content: As we all know Cadmax is recognised as best firm in urban planning, and they have proved it to me by planning the Govind Bagh with best accuracy possible
govind-bagh.name: MR. Raju Chopra

kedia-landmark.title: Kedia’s Landmark
kedia-landmark.description: Kedia’s Landmark in Bagru Khurd is a thoughtfully planned residential township, offering plots in varying sizes, modern amenities, and eco-conscious infrastructure. With a strategic location, official development approvals, and a scheduled completion by early 2026, it represents a promising opportunity for end-users or investors looking to tap into growing outskirts of Jaipur.
kedia-landmark.content: The quality of planning is top-notch, and it’s evident that Cadmax Projects doesn’t cut corners when it comes to workmanship. The design is both functional and elegant, with thoughtful touches that truly make it feel like home.
kedia-landmark.name: Mr. Gaurav Kedia

rudra-mahal.title: Rudra  Mahal
rudra-mahal.description: Rudra Mahal is a majestic 5-star luxury hotel inspired by the rich Rajasthani royal heritage. Nestled in the heart of Rajasthan, the hotel blends traditional Rajputana architecture with modern elegance, offering guests a regal experience steeped in culture, comfort, and hospitality.
rudra-mahal.content: I got the best designing service that I could , the perfection in designing rajasthan heritage hotel is amazing, the interiors tells us about how creatively can one design a space in heritage theme.
rudra-mahal.name: Mr. Jugal Kishore Meena

riyasat-ecopark.title: Riyasat Ecopark
riyasat-ecopark.description: Riyasat Eco Park bridges cultural heritage and modern township living—providing both aesthetic appeal and functional infrastructure. Its thoughtful planning, emphasis on green and spiritual spaces, and strong connectivity make it an attractive option for both residents and investors seeking a blend of tradition and convenience.
riyasat-ecopark.content: Not only the Riyasat ecopark, I have planned all of my schemes from Cadmax and always got the best planning possible
riyasat-ecopark.name: Mr. Sumer Singh Saini

riyasat-sankalp.title: Riyasat Sankalp
riyasat-sankalp.description: The Riyasat Sankalp in Panvel, Navi Mumbai is a premier, RERA- and MSRDC-approved plotted township by Riyasat Infra. Designed for luxury, comfort, sustainability, and community, the project features gated security, underground infrastructure, landscaped parks, temples, a clubhouse, swimming pool, gyms (indoor and open-air), sports facilities, meditation zones, and more. Educational institutions, hospitals, transit hubs, and key highways are just minutes away—making it ideal for families and investors alike.
riyasat-sankalp.content: Riyasat Sankalp was my first township project in Mumbai, Cadmax made it easy for me through their great urban planning services.
riyasat-sankalp.name: Mr.Sumer Singh Saini

shivam-magnus.title: Shivam Magnus
shivam-magnus.description: Shivam Magnus is the upcoming stunning apartment project by Cadmax $ Mahakal Builders comprising of fully furnished 2 BHK, 3BHK spacious flats with amanities like swimming pool , playgroud , gym etc that will elevate the living standards of the residents of such a majestic apartment.
shivam-magnus.content: Exactly same as Shivam Majestic, Cadmax helped me to built one of the best apartment in jagatpura through their unique and creative designing services.
shivam-magnus.name: Mr. Dilip Rathore
